price: ߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߰ ߞߊ߲ߘߐߜߍߟߍ߲ ߘߊ߬ߡߊ ߟߊߝߟߌ߬ ߔߊߦߌߔߊߦߌ ߘߐ߫
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
